crying home to Mama.>> Oh, my God!
(laughter)>> Oh!
>> I want to kill Sugar.I hate her.
>> I'm Sugar.>> PROBST: For the first time...
>> I'm a professional gamer.>> PROBST: ...watch the audition

>> I need a little pain.I need a little suffering.
>> PROBST: And follow theunlikely stories of how the

baby.>> PROBST: Bob...
>> My strategy is to be needed.That's going to get me further
on in the game.>> PROBST: Sugar...
>> I'm not too bad at this.(laughs)
I'm a lot better than I thoughtfor sure.
>> PROBST: Susie...>> It's about knowing when to
react.I mean, I really feel confident
I know when to jump.>> PROBST: Matty...
>> This is by far the hardestthing I've ever done.
My whole driving force out hereis Jamie; she's my girlfriend.
>> PROBST: And Corinne...>> I'm here 'cause I want to
win.I believe that I'll be in the
top three.>> PROBST: From the very first

>> Susie, come on home!>> I knew it.
>> I'm going to pick the bighomey with all the game right
there.>> PROBST: It was immediately
clear that Fang was physicallyweaker than Kota and this would

14 challenges.Kota wins immunity!
>> Yeah!>> PROBST: Kota wins immunity!
Kota scores!Kota!
Kota!Kota wins immunity and reward!
This is not even close.>> I'm starting to lose my

We don't match up to Kotaphysically.
We don't match up to Kotamentally.
We don't match up to Kota.>> PROBST: The Fang tribe
bickered.>> Eat your rice.
(mumbling)>> Randy, are you, like, the
leader of the tribe now?>> Drop it.
>> I don't have to drop nothing,man.
I can ask you something if Iwant.
>> And I can just ignore youthen.
>> PROBST: Michelle, the tribehas spoken.
And their tribe quicklydwindled.
Gillian.>> Bummer.
>> PROBST: Kota lost one memberearly on.
Paloma, the tribe has spoken.But they remained rational and
united.>> All right, Marcus!
(cheering)>> Our morale was super high.
We love our team.>> PROBST: Marcus artfully kept
things together...>> And away we go.
>> PROBST: ...and made a solidearly alliance with Charlie,
Corinne, and Jacquie.These four looked poised to go
all the way to the end.But it's not always the obvious
front-runner that comes out ontop.
Marcus drops a pole.He's out of the challenge.
And amazingly...The tribe has spoken.
...out of this early powerhousealliance, only Corinne made it
to the final seven.What are you about to see is the
story of a quiet group ofunderdogs who slowly finessed
their games and ended up on top.(theme song playing)

Okay, got to go.So, please call me, Mr. Burnett.

The second tactic ismanipulation.

a half months ago, and I need togrow up a lot more than I am

thing that-that I could do formyself.
I would like to eat some snailsand raw fish and bugs and

>> All righty.>> Hey, so, I got some company.
Thanks for watching.>> My name is Matty Whitmore.
I was put on this planet for thesole purpose of being on this
show.Matty, Dink, and Jamie.
I love my girl and my boy.My hard-core physical training.
My hard-core philosophy.It takes focus and discipline
because living a dream here inparadise only gets you so far.
I need a little pain.I need a little suffering.
♪ ♪>> PROBST: 30 days ago, 18

I have corn and beans.♪ ♪

>> Yes. Yesterday, you guys werestanding at the end of the dock.

married at the end of the dockright there?"
Yeah, you got some problems.You need to watch yourself.
I have no intention of stayingwith them if they continue
this behavior.It's just not...
It's bad business.(hoots)
>> PROBST: When Fang finally wona reward challenge...
Fang wins reward!(cheering)

>> I knew that.>> PROBST: How did you know

>> PROBST: Some of Sugar'stribe mates had little faith

>> (gasps) Oh, my God, I foundit!

♪ Jamie's a jolly good womanThat nobody can deny. ♪

Uh, I mean, everything.You know, one-one tops the

He's been dead five years, andI miss him to this day.

uh, Matty knows, if you get me,you're not offended by me.

>> I'm so happy.(laughs)
I could cry.(laughs)
